weapon_abyssal_blade_description: Melee, damage 1-3, high accuracy. Has a chance to inflict emptiness on the target, after which it can lower her maximum energy.
state_emptiness_energy_loss: 🎆|{0} are losing energy from being empty. {1} energy left.
weapon_boomerang_description: Long range weapon, damage 1-4, returning in 2 turns.
boomerang_attack_text: 🪃|{0} launches a boomerang and deals {1} damage to {2}.
boomerang_attack_text_miss: 💨|{0} launches a boomerang at {1} but misses.
boomerang_return_text: 🪃|Boomerang returns to {0} and deals {1} damage to {2}.
boomerang_return_text_miss: 💨|The boomerang returns to {0} but doesn't hit {1}
weapon_chainsaw_description: Melee weapon, you can spend a turn to start
weapon_chainsaw_active: {0} has started the chainsaw and will run for another {1} stroke.
weapon_cursed_sword_description: Melee, 1-3 damage, high accuracy. Has a chance to inflict a weakness on the target.
state_weakness_energy_cost_increase: 🫠|{0} consumes {1} more energy because of weakness
weapon_dagger_description: A melee weapon. Has a chance of inflicting mutilation
state_mutilation_timer: 🎆|{0} feels the pain of the mutilation. ({1})
weapon_electric_whip_description: A melee weapon that allows you to deal damage to up to three targets
weapon_electric_whip_multiple_targets_te: 👊|{0} Hits {1} and deals {2} damage. Electricity hits {3} and deals {4} damage!
weapon_electric_whip_tertiary_targets_te: 👊|{0} Hits {1} and does {2} damage. Electricity hits {3} and {4}, and does {4}, {5} damage!
weapon_emitter_description: Ranged combat, damage 1-3. Has a chance to inflict starvation on the target.
state_recovery_from_hunger: {0} has recovered from hunger! Current hunger level: {1}
hunger_reduced_by_item: {0} has used {1}. Hunger level has been reduced to {2}.
weapon_grenade_launcher_description: Ranged, 1-4 damage, shoots grenades, damaging 2 targets
grenade_grenade_launcher_text: 💣|{0} shoots with the grenade launcher! Dealt {1} damage to the following targets: {2}.
molotov_grenade_launcher_text: 🍸|{0} shoots with the grenade launcher! {1} on fire!
molotov_grenade_launcher_text_miss: 💨|{0} fires a grenade launcher at {1}! but misses.
weapon_hell_bow_description: Ranged weapon, allows you to deal damage to all targets
weapon_hell_bow_explosion_arrow_single_t: 💥|{0} fires an explosive arrow at {1} and deals {2} damage!
weapon_hell_bow_explosion_arrow_multiple: 💥|{0} Fires an explosive arrow at {1} and does {2} damage. The explosion hits {3} and does {4} damage to all of them!
weapon_hell_bow_explosion_arrow_text_mis: 💨|{0} fires an explosive arrow at {1}, but it doesn't hit.
weapon_hook_description: A melee weapon, allows you to draw a target towards you
hook_attract_text: 🪝|{0} uses a hook and pulls {1} towards you, and deals {2} damage!
hook_attract_text_miss: 💨||{0} uses the hook to pull {1} in, but it doesn't hit.
weapon_needle_fan_description: A ranged, needle-throwing weapon. Starts combat with 1 needle and regenerates needles every turn
weapon_needle_fan_attack_text: {0} throws needles and deals {1} damage to {2}.
weapon_needle_fan_no_needles_text: {0} has no needles to attack with.
weapon_shurikens_description: A ranged weapon that allows you to mint two shurikens at once. Shurikens must be picked up.
weapon_shuriken_throw_name: {0} throws a shuriken and does {1} damage {2}.
weapon_double_shuriken_throw_name: {0} throws a shuriken and does {1} damage {2}.
weapon_tomahawk_description: A melee weapon that allows you to throw a tomahawk at an enemy, dealing +2 damage. The tomahawk must be raised
tomahawk_throw_text: {0} Throws a tomahawk and deals {1} damage {2}.
tomahawk_throw_text_miss: 💨|{0} throws a tomahawk at {1}, but it doesn't hit.
weapon_vampiric_whip_description: A melee weapon that inflicts Exhaustion when attacked with a chance. If Deterioration reaches 3, the player regains life.
state_dehydration_hp_recovery: 🎆|{0} Restores hp through desiccation. {1} hp remaining.
skill_explosion_effect_text: 💮|A huge wave of flame strikes {0} and deals {1} damage, setting the target on fire. {2} falls to the ground without power.
skill_explosion_staff_text: 💮|{0} pulls out his staff and points it at {1}
skill_explosion_delay_text_1: 💬 O darkness where no light penetrates, O black flame that does not light the darkness, hear my call. Burn everything and everyone where your punishing hand reaches.
skill_explosion_delay_text_2: 💬 O crimson power that pierces the sky! O immeasurable power that shakes the earth! Hear my call and appear before me! Return the entire universe to its primordial chaos! Let my magical torrent of destruction wipe everything off the face of the earth!
skill_explosion_delay_text_3: 💬 O darkness that becomes a sword! Blast my enemy into splinters and leave no trace!
skill_explosion_delay_text_4: 💬 O you who bear the name of explosion, show your true power! Let nothing remain in the path of your destruction!
item_cryo_grenade_text: 💣🧊|{0} throws a cryo-grenade! The following targets: {1} stunned.
item_sour_candy_effect: ⚡️|Sour Candy distorts the face {0}, thus increasing max energy by 1.
item_sour_candy_wear_off: ⚡️|Face {0} comes to normal, as does max energy
state_regeneration_hp_recovery: 💗|{0} Restores hp from regeneration. {1} hp remaining.
